remarks: Closed form of ~ nfex .  Derived from ~ hbexgVD .  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 8-Feb-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Dec-2016.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: hbexg $p |- ( A. x A. y ( ph -> A. x ph ) -> A. x A. y ( E. y ph -> A. x E. y ph ) ) $.
